channel.title: RL Stevens
channel.description: For many, RL Stevens also pinpoints your best functional and industry career options. When you identify employer needs through in-depth market research, then develop a personalized solution and communication initiative that aligns with those needs, you will yield a positive outcome.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: RL Stevens

item.title: RL Stevens Podcast 9
item.description: RL Stevens covers how and when your present income should be revealed, exactly what should be negotiated, the greatest level of responsibility, compensation package and other extras. Most job candidates lack the expertise and knowledge to counter offer and obtain items other than salary. Perksmay include bonuses, vacation time, stock options, health insurance, 401K, flexible hours, professional growth opportunities, accelerated salary reviews and more.
item.dc:creator: RL Stevens

item.title: RL Stevens Podcast 8
item.description: At RL Stevens, our concept of career management involves more than just assisting you to win an excellent position. By investing in yourself, your percentage return on investment is substantially higher than any investment such as stock market and real estate.
item.dc:creator: RL Stevens
item.itunes:summary: At RL Stevens, our concept of career management involves more than just assisting you to win an excellent position. By investing in yourself, your percentage return on investment is substantially higher than any investment such as stock market and real estate.

item.title: RL Stevens Podcast 7
item.description: RL Stevens helps clients professionally manage their careers from job searching, to career advancement and transitioning, to career retirement. The result is for you to be able to reflect on your career at its culmination and see that it was well planned with positive contributions.
item.dc:creator: RL Stevens
item.itunes:summary: RL Stevens helps clients professionally manage their careers from job searching, to career advancement and transitioning, to career retirement. The result is for you to be able to reflect on your career at its culmination and see that it was well planned with positive contributions.

item.title: RL Stevens Podcast 6
item.description: Before any obligation exists for you or RL Stevens, a careful evaluation will be completed to establish the exact work to be done for you in accordance with your career goals.
item.dc:creator: RL Stevens
item.itunes:summary: Before any obligation exists for you or RL Stevens, a careful evaluation will be completed to establish the exact work to be done for you in accordance with your career goals.

item.title: RL Stevens Podcast 4
item.description: RL Stevens also identifies employers that match your career objectives and provide information on events that trigger hiring activity, thus allowing early approaches to hiring management before jobs are formally posted or listed with search firms.
item.dc:creator: RL Stevens
item.itunes:summary: RL Stevens also identifies employers that match your career objectives and provide information on events that trigger hiring activity, thus allowing early approaches to hiring management before jobs are formally posted or listed with search firms.

item.title: RL Stevens Podcast 3
item.description: RL Stevens provides you with quality job leads and new opportunities focused beyond ads and the Internet. Most quality job leads are not advertised. RL Stevens provides specific company research, including deep-level information on companies, industries and competition.
item.dc:creator: RL Stevens

item.title: RL Stevens Podcast 1
item.description: For 29 years, RL Stevens has helped thousands of professionals and executives secure new career positions in the fastest, most efficient manner.
item.dc:creator: RL Stevens
item.itunes:summary: For 29 years, RL Stevens has helped thousands of professionals and executives secure new career positions in the fastest, most efficient manner.

item.title: RL Stevens Podcast 2
item.description: RL Stevens Provides the keys to authentic success: exposure to the right opportunities, organizations and decision-makers in the advertised and unadvertised marketplace.
item.dc:creator: RL Stevens
